
---

<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Use this data source to get the available zones in current region. Must set product param to fetch the product infomations(e.g. => cvm, vpc). By default only `AVAILABLE` zones will be returned, but `UNAVAILABLE` zones can also be fetched when `include_unavailable` is specified.

## Example Usage

<!--Start PulumiCodeChooser -->
```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as tencentcloud from "@tencentcloud_iac/pulumi";

const all = tencentcloud.Availability.getZonesByProduct({
    product: "cvm",
});
```
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_tencentcloud as tencentcloud

all = tencentcloud.Availability.get_zones_by_product(product="cvm")
```
```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using Pulumi;
using Tencentcloud = Pulumi.Tencentcloud;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() =>

        Product = "cvm",

});
```
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
	"github.com/tencentcloudstack/pulumi-tencentcloud/sdk/go/tencentcloud/Availability"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := Availability.GetZonesByProduct(ctx, &availability.GetZonesByProductArgs{
			Product: "cvm",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

        <span class="property-type"><a href="#getzonesbyproductzone">List&lt;Tencent<wbr>Cloud<wbr>IAC.<wbr>Pulumi<wbr>Package.<wbr>Tencentcloud.<wbr>Availability.<wbr>Outputs.<wbr>Get<wbr>Zones<wbr>By<wbr>Product<wbr>Zone&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>A list of zones will be exported and its every element contains the following attributes:</p>

            title="">
        <span id="includeunavailable_csharp">

            title="">
        <span id="name_csharp">

## Supporting Types


<h4 id="getzonesbyproductzone">Get<wbr>Zones<wbr>By<wbr>Product<wbr>Zone</h4>



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="description_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#description_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The description of the zone, like <code>Guangzhou Zone 3</code>.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="id_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#id_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>An internal id for the zone, like <code>200003</code>, usually not so useful.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="name_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>When specified, only the zone with the exactly name match will be returned.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="state_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">State</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The state of the zone, indicate availability using <code>AVAILABLE</code> and <code>UNAVAILABLE</code> values.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The description of the zone, like <code>Guangzhou Zone 3</code>.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="id_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#id_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>An internal id for the zone, like <code>200003</code>, usually not so useful.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="name_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>When specified, only the zone with the exactly name match will be returned.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="state_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">state</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The state of the zone, indicate availability using <code>AVAILABLE</code> and <code>UNAVAILABLE</code> values.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
